pages.description: You notice something poking out from among the debris.

You find an empty journal.

Best to write down everything, in case you forget things again.

NOTE:
The game auto-saves from time to time.

Important information are stored here for future reference, check on it regularly.

The journal allows you to reload the game from previously saved states.

BE CAREFUL!

Loading to an older save deletes all future saves.

Press TAB or click the Journal icon on the left side of the screen to open it.
